General.Name: iCatch Technology Inc.
General.Description: iCatch Technology, Inc. designs and sells fabless IC. The company researches and develops advanced digital imaging SoC solutions for image signal processor, advanced video codec, and system integration. It also offers automotive grade sensing camera module image signal processor for use in ADAS front cameras, rear view cameras, and blind spot detection; and an automotive grade SoC for use in digital video recorders, and camera and driver monitoring systems. In addition, the company provides SoC for consumer imaging devices for use in digital, action, video conferencing cameras, drone, and VR headsets; and smart door locks, security cameras, 3D sensing, and single board cameras. The company has a collaboration with Valens Semiconductor Ltd. to develop a multi-camera videoconferencing solution. iCatch Technology, Inc. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 19-1, Innovation 1st Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 300
